segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, waiting for her brother to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so eager and excited, like she can't wait to get her hands on one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit happy seeing her anticipation, but also a bit worried about her brother on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far to reach the cookies, and it looks like he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she should be careful not to distract him too much, or he might lose his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, and I hope it doesn't tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why they don't just ask their mother for a cookie instead of risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's arm is raised, and she looks ready to catch a cookie at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit nervous watching them, but also a bit happy seeing their excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen seems a bit chaotic with the water overflowing and the children trying to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies without any accidents happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
